page.title: 09BLYTH PLAY GROUP.
page.content: The play group is run by a supervisor assisted by mums on a rota. There is a committee which meets once a month where desisions are made and fund raising events discussed as we are a charitable organisation. We have a grant for toys from social services. We like parents to be involved as much as possible. Our aims are to let the children learn through play and watching others. We create a happy, safe and secure environment. When children leave the play group we hope they are adjusted to school and can socialise, share and listen. We like to get to know our children but not to get too involved with their home lives. You've got to love doing the playgroup. It's no use if it's just a job. It comes across with children they need a happy loving and caring atmosphere.
